website_summaries.verdict: Though the Vibram FiveFingers VI-S received mostly positive feedback, there were still some unhappy purchasers. However, because it was very comfortable to wear, not to mention stylish, lightweight, and versatile, it still came highly recommended by those who bought and regularly used it.
pros: Almost all of the reviewers commended the comfort delivered by the Vibram FiveFingers VI-S
some even mentioned no longer experiencing foot and back pain since they started wearing it
A vast majority of shoppers called this trainer cute and were very pleased that it paired well with casual getups like shorts, dresses, capri pants, and it even looks good with gym clothes
The footwear was deemed versatile by a myriad of users because they were able to use it for working out, hiking, running errands, walking, jogging, etc
Numerous owners liked that they often forgot they were wearing this model because of how light it was
The fit was deemed perfect by a good number of people
Plenty of individuals were amazed that this merchandise brought a true barefoot experience while it still protected the foot against elements on the ground
The outsole was grippy on smooth gym floors and wet, uneven surfaces, according to a lot of fitness enthusiasts
Multiple buyers appreciated the upper material because it was breathable and dried fast if it got wet
cons: The strap irked a minority of critics because it felt too flimsy, dug into the skin and that the closure can easily get unhooked
Several testers noted that if you are new to wearing minimalist shoes, this model may not be the best starter footwear because the outsole is so thin that the wearer feels everything she steps on
Those with bunions do not recommend getting this footgear because it will not be able to accommodate the foot issues
A handful of wearers complained that the arch section of the outsole was too narrow which resulted in a part of their foot touching the ground

customer_reviews.title: Stinky shoes
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3 orders to find the right size for me as it's sooo confusing. So far I'm using those shoes as a slippers at home but can't wait to wear them outside as I love walking bare feet, but unfortunately it's a bit dangerous in the city so hopefully those shoes will protect my feet without taking away the feeling of freedom which I have without shoes:) I was happy with my shoes until I found out how my feet stink! I don't have this problem with another shoes, but those are category of exception. Would not recommend them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lucaloo

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and more socially acceptable than full finger finger shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of vibrams five finger shoes and wear them virtually all the time. Sadly it's not really socially acceptable to wear the normal ones for a wedding, however these were perfect. Nobody noticed (and I get comments all the time on my full foot version). My feet were super comfy, and I didn't look completely mad. I wouldn't wear them for running or a workout as they don't feel quite as secure as the full foot version.
customer_reviews.author: Stephie

customer_reviews.title: The sizing is all to pot!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to order size 5-5.5 UK. Arrived too small. Tried 5.5 - 6, ditto and then 6-6.5, too small again. Only at that point did I notice that the corresponding EU sizes are actually different, for example 6-6.5 is listed as EU 38 - which is actually size 5. I have now ordered 6.5 - 7, which shows as EU 39 so I am quietly confident. Given that we select by UK size and the EU size (which actually matches the shoe delivered) doesn't appear until it reaches your basket, this isn't much help.
customer_reviews.author: R Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Wrong UK/ EU size conversion!
customer_reviews.text: The conversion of the UK 5.5/ 6 should be EU 39, you have incorrectly entered it as EU 37, I then clearly labelled the reason I wanted a replacement as this reason and stated that I needed the correct EU 39. I have again just received an EU 37, this is a UK 4!
customer_reviews.author: Clairemaley

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I had a few pairs of Vibram Fivefingers before I bought these, I wanted something more like a sandal for taking on holiday. These fit the bill perfectly! I normally end up with blisters and rubbed uncomfortable feet, none of this with these lovely shoes. The Vibram Vi-S-W is elegant, comfortable and keeps foot cool.
customer_reviews.author: P. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are extremely comfortable, and smart enough to get away with wearing to work. Not a day has passed when I haven't worn these, since they arrived. They need washing frequently, but dry overnight. The only downside is people commenting on them practically everywhere I go...
customer_reviews.author: thombol

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Amazing this is all I can wear. I cut out a stick on sole and heal and stuck them on these shoes to make them last longer and give more support to under the foot. Works well. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Fitdolly

customer_reviews.title: Best type of vibrate shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I wish they make more of these and don't discontinue them.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Konaklieva

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've Not tried these yet but, my mum who is the same size as I tried them on for me. She loves them and says they are super comfortable. I can't wait to try them myself.
customer_reviews.author: YvE

customer_reviews.title: Great now I've got the right size
customer_reviews.text: I'm a UK size 5.5 (EU38) usually, the UK size 5.5-6 came as EU size37 so was too small. I returned free of charge and exchanged for 6-6.5 (EU 38) in these shoes and they fit really well. Have only worn them around the house so far. Looking forward to using them for dance classes.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette D.

customer_reviews.title: More great Vibrams
customer_reviews.text: Great - fitted well without socks, I usually fit the next size up if wearing socks.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Xxxx
customer_reviews.text: Second pair first pair sent back as too small I have wide feet size larger than usual fits well
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

product_meta.title: Vibram FiveFingers Women's Vi-s-w Multisport Outdoor Shoes
product_meta.description: An elegant, form-fitting design, the VI-S is one part graceful fashion sandal, one part hard-working KSO Evo.
feature_bullets: Form fitting and open sandal upper flatters the foot
Stretch adjustable closure system with easy side release
Serrated blade lug design outsole. Foot length : Longest toe measurement in inches (+/- 0.125 ) Inches
